titleStmt.title: Proclamation prorogating the dyet, for in bringing and prescribing the method of settling of the accompts of arrears due by the forces to the countrey.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms in ornamental border at head of text; initial letter.
Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the twenty second day of January, and of Our Reign the sixth year, 1695.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

person.persName: the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson
